metadata.title: CVE-2021-33656 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
When setting font with malicous data by ioctl cmd PIO_FONT,kernel willwrite memory out of bounds.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33656` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1052-dell300x - 4.15.0-1052.57
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1118-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1118.126
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1136-snapdragon - 4.15.0-1136.146
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-192.203').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
